messages.message:
sigh upgrading Docker Desktop to 4.17.0 broke my local env, has anyone upgraded without any issues?

my local env works for a bit, but then the docker DNS starts failing for some reason and then `server-nginx` can’t connect with any other service

i’ve already restarted docker once, which solves the issue

let’s see if restarting again will solve the issue for good

sigh looks like this bug has been reported already https://github.com/docker/for-mac/issues/6654

downgrading should solve the problem, i’ll start a thread in <#C0106JV0TFS|>

Could someone else also try upgrading and confirm whether their local instabase env stops working after ~5 min?

We need to confirm whether this is a repeated issue before removing the upgrade requirement cc @Dave
I have a similar issue after upgrading yesterday!

```Cannot connect to the Docker daemon at unix:///Users/cherylzhr/.colima/default/docker.sock. Is the docker daemon running?
make[1]: *** [build] Error 1
make: *** [fetch-www-pages] Error 2```
Did revving down solve the issue for you?
oh it didn't solve the issue
I should ask where both of you got your installer from or if you were using the Kandji Self Service app
oh sorry i think my issue might be irrelevant. it has to do with a docker set up script i ran yesterday that installed and started using colima
